text: The Morava (; ) is a long river in Central Europe. It is a left tributary of the Danube. The river starts in the Králický Sněžník mountains in northwestern Moravia, near the border between the Czech Republic and Poland. The lower part of the river's course forms the border between the Czech Republic and Slovakia and then between Austria and Slovakia. The longest tributary river is the Thaya (). The largest left tributary is the Bečva. Category:Rivers of Austria Category:Rivers of the Czech Republic Category:Rivers of Slovakia Category:Tributaries of the Danube
title: Morava (river)
